vsParam:
Oh, Peppermint is humming blissfully again today.
And she looks more joyful than usual.

We don't celebrate Christmas in Fairyland.
That makes me look forward to it every year.

Oh, I see...
So why are you so looking forward to Christmas?

Let me see... For instance, tasty food? Tasty apples?
I think there will be lots of food this year too?

What was that about? So rude.
Never mind, I'm letting it go as Christmas is imminent.
Look, the Academy serves unique Christmas cuisines.

The Academy will purchase various local products
in Bressisle and ask the students cook various cuisines.

Oh. So we can enjoy a feast this year? Wonderful!
Cuisines, cuisines! Delicious cuisines!

I need you to gather ingredients for cuisines.
We ran out of them halfway through the event last year.

Oregano helped prepare ingredients last year,
but he's not available this year.

So, please stand in for him to gather ingredients for us.
Of course I'll reward you!

Hey, Peppermint!? Don't make a promise that easily!
We're occupied with other stuff...

OK! [px].
Let's gather ingredients now! Off we go!

Haha... She already promised Hazel.
So let's try our best for everyone's sake!
